MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.45pm to repair a fault on the underground cable network, caused by third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.31pm on Thursday 19th November 2020.
